TopicTitle: My mini-documentary on Reusable Launch Vehicles

Articles.Content:
I made this for a school project and it got great feedback on the SpaceX subreddit but haven't shared with the KSP community yet so I thought I would.  

Just a disclaimer - there are 2 or 3 mistakes such as I said that Adeline uses solar propulsion for the return but its in fact just 'low power' but other than that I am pretty happy with it so give it a watch and let me know what you think.  

Thanks and enjoy
